name: GREEN-API for WhatsApp OpenAI chatbot
description:
Full article: https://green-api.com/en/docs/integration/make/ai-chat-bot/

In this template, we'll create an AI-powered chatbot with OpenAI in WhatsApp. 

The bot is implemented using the GREEN-API and OpenAI applications for the Make platform. 

You'll need GREEN-API instance https://green-api.com/ and OpenAI API key and Organization key https://openai.com/
